alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 11 at 2:15PM MST until April 12 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern Arizona including Page, Lees Ferry, Grand Canyon Village, Supai, North Rim, and Valle. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
